com.nalvared.ntag21xseries

Interface NTagEventListener


  • public interface NTagEventListener

    NTag21x

    This interface provide two method for interacting with the NTag21x

    Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com

    • Method Detail

      • OnSuccess

        void OnSuccess(java.lang.Object response,
               int code)
        This method is always called when a function ends as expected
        Parameters:
        response - - It is a byte[] or String depending of the called function Object can be cast as following when is used the class NTag21x:
        • Cast Object to byte[]
          • NTag21x.getStaticId(int, NTagEventListener) with NTag21x.UID_BYTES flag
          • NTag21x.getUserMemory(NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.read(NTagEventListener)
        • Cast Object to String
          • NTag21x.getStaticId(int, NTagEventListener) with NTag21x.UID_SRTING
          • NTag21x.write(byte[], NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.writeAndTrucate(byte[], NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.authAndWrite(byte[], byte[], byte[], NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.hasPassword(NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.setPassword(byte[], byte[], int, NTagEventListener)
          • NTag21x.removePassword(byte[], byte[], NTagEventListener)
        code - - Identifier response code

      • OnError

        void OnError(java.lang.String error,
             int code)
        When a function catch an error, this method is called
        Parameters:
        error - - try - catch error message
        code - - Identifier of error
